24  package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.management.impl;
25  
26  import javax.management.MalformedObjectNameException;
27  import javax.management.ObjectName;
28  
29  /**
30   * Utility class used for getting {@link javax.management.ObjectName}'s for ehcache hibernate MBeans
31   * <p/>
32   * <p/>
33   *
34   * @author <a href="mailto:asanoujam@terracottatech.com">Abhishek Sanoujam</a>
35   * @since 1.7
36   */
37  public abstract class EhcacheHibernateMbeanNames {
38  
39  	/**
40  	 * Group id for all sampled mbeans registered
41  	 */
42  	public static final String GROUP_ID = "net.sf.ehcache.hibernate";
43  
44  	/**
45  	 * Type for the ehcache backed hibernate second level cache statistics mbean
46  	 */
47  	public static final String EHCACHE_HIBERNATE_TYPE = "EhcacheHibernateStats";
48  
49  	/**
50  	 * Filter out invalid ObjectName characters from s.
51  	 *
52  	 * @param s
53  	 *
54  	 * @return A valid JMX ObjectName attribute value.
55  	 */
56  	public static String mbeanSafe(String s) {
57  		return s == null ? "" : s.replaceAll( ":|=|\n", "." );
58  	}
59  
60  	/**
61  	 * Returns an ObjectName for the passed name
62  	 *
63  	 * @param name
64  	 *
65  	 * @return An {@link javax.management.ObjectName} using the input name of cache manager
66  	 *
67  	 * @throws javax.management.MalformedObjectNameException
68  	 */
69  	public static ObjectName getCacheManagerObjectName(String cacheManagerClusterUUID, String name)
70  			throws MalformedObjectNameException {
71  		ObjectName objectName = new ObjectName(
72  				GROUP_ID + ":type=" + EHCACHE_HIBERNATE_TYPE + ",name=" + mbeanSafe( name )
73  						+ getBeanNameSuffix( cacheManagerClusterUUID )
74  		);
75  		return objectName;
76  	}
77  
78  	private static String getBeanNameSuffix(String cacheManagerClusterUUID) {
79  		String suffix = "";
80  		if ( !isBlank( cacheManagerClusterUUID ) ) {
81  			suffix = ",node=" + cacheManagerClusterUUID;
82  		}
83  		return suffix;
84  	}
85  
86  	private static boolean isBlank(String param) {
87  		return param == null || "".equals( param.trim() );
88  	}
89  }
